Description:
As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Creating the character rigging.
- Ensuring smooth animation transitions.
- Collaborating with animators to refine movements.

As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Designing complex rigging setups.
- Integrating with VFX teams.
- Optimizing rig performance for various scenes.

As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Developing mechanical and organic rigs.
- Testing rigs for animation readiness.
- Providing technical support during production.

As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Implementing facial rigging.
- Collaborating with the animation team.
- Ensuring rigs met artistic and technical requirements.

As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Building rigs for various creatures.
- Assisting with animation problem-solving.
- Streamlining the rigging pipeline.

As a rigger, my responsibilities on this project included:
- Rigging characters for key scenes.
- Working closely with the modeling department.
- Ensuring rigs were user-friendly for animators.
